definitionGroups.group: Something which is proposed, or offered for consideration or acceptance

examples: proposals for the construction of a new building
to make proposals for a treaty of peace

entries.meaning: The document on which such a thing is written.
examples: Lewis, who had been sent to London to set up EA's European office, wrote a proposal for a lavish, high-tech football...

entries.meaning: The act of asking someone to be one's spouse; an offer of marriage
examples: Kanye may have been love stricken when Kim accepted his proposal to marry him but Kim has always supported the idea of a prenup.

entries.meaning: (law) The offer by a party of what he has in view as to an intended business transaction, which, with acceptance, constitutes a contract.
